short_summary: Laboratory analysis and testing of Water, Sewage and Soil Samples
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-10-11 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. SUMMARY:  The Work comprises the provision of, as and when requested, all labour, materials, tools, equipment, expertise, administration, and supervision required to carry out laboratory analysis and testing of Water, Sewage and Soil Samples. OBJECTIVE:  . Analysis of samples is to commence immediately upon receipt of samples in the laboratory facility and is to be completed within the applicable sample holding time. The analysis laboratory must be a maximum of 75 km from the Dundurn base. PERIOD OF CONTRACT: The standing offer will be a period of five (5) years from 2024-03-01 to 2029-02-28.

full_summary:
tamplate bene
===============

### Contract Notification

#### Contract Title and Reference

Water Resources Analysis and Testing Services
-----------------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting bids for a Standing Offer for laboratory analysis and testing of water, sewage, and soil samples. This contract shall run for a period of 5 years, from 01 March 2024 to 28 February 2029.

#### Key Dates

*   Tender Closing Date: 11 October 2023, 14:00 EDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 01 March 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: 28 February 2029

#### Procurement Details

This Standing Offer was originally published through Ariba Discovery. The relevant postal code for this procurement is K1A 0S5.

#### Procurement Category

*   Service Category: SRV

#### Tender Type

*   Request for Standing Offer (RFMO)

#### Award Process

Bids shall be evaluated based on the Bidder’s lowest price for delivering laboratory analysis and testing services.

### SUPPLY

The successful bidder must deliver a comprehensive laboratory analysis and testing service that provides the following:

*   Analysis and testing of water, sewage, and soil samples
*   Maintenance of inventory and supply chain

### CLAIMS AND DISPUTES RESOLUTION

Any claims or disputes arising under this Standing Offer shall be resolved in accordance with the laws of the province of Quebec, Canada.

#### Rate

The recommended rate for a Standing Offer is in accordance with the applicable rates published by the Department of National Defence (DND) for this procurement request. This includes:

*   Ontario Institute of Management and Technology(Manj Charts).
